title: Jennifer Aniston shares very rare childhood photo for Throwback Thursday
text:
Jennifer Aniston shared a rare throwback photo from when she was a small child on Thursday.

The 50-year-old Friends vet looked to be about three-years-old as she stared into the camera with a floral-print hat on.

The second photo in the post was of a very similar pose where the LA native was in a floppy hat looking in the camera. The image was from a recent InStyle cover.

Baby Jenny! Jennifer Aniston shared a rare throwback photo from when she was a small child on Thursday. The 50-year-old Friends vet looked to be about three-years-old as she stared into the camera with a floral-print hat on

Now: The second photo in the post was of a very similar pose where the LA native was in a floppy hat looking in the camera. The image was from a recent InStyle cover. The caption read, '#TBT In style, then and now...'

‹ Slide me › What a difference 40 plus years make: On the left Jen is about three-years-old. On the right she is 50-years-old

The caption read, '#TBT In style, then and now...'

This is Jennifer's very first throwback Thursday post as she only joined Instagram on Tuesday and already has 12.6M followers.

Aniston is following 134 people including Courteney Cox and her ex Justin Theroux.

Her first post was a Friends reunion with all her co-stars: Cox, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry, David Schwimmer and Lisa Kudrow.

In her early 20s: Most of the 'old' photos of Aniston are only from the 1990s; seen with Mayim Bialik

She got so many views that she 'broke' Instagram causing fans to not be able to log on to her page.

In her second post she was seen trying to break her phone.

'I swear I didn’t mean to break it... Thank you guys for the kind, glitchy welcome ❤️' she jokingly captioned.

Jennifer was playing the character of Alex Levy from her new series The Morning Show, sitting in the makeup chair with her phone before throwing it out of some sort of frustration.

Not happy: Aniston hilariously apologized for breaking the internet on Wednesday, sharing a video from The Morning Show where she threw her phone in rage

It's official! And while fans have joked about her breaking records by appearing on Instagram, it appears to be official with the Guisness World Records account commenting on her recent post

And while fans have joked about her breaking records by appearing on Instagram, it appears to be official with the Guinness World Records account commenting on her recent post.

'Congrats on your record Jen! Check your DMs,' they wrote.

Before Jennifer, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle held the record for the fastest Instagram account to reach one million. They've held the title since debuting their account in April when they amassed the numbers within 5 hours and 45 minutes.

The Murder Mystery star made the feat in just 5 hours and 16 minutes.

Jenna Dewan, Kaley Cuoco, Mindy Kaling, Olivia Wilde, Jamie Redknapp, Rachel Zoe and ex-husband Justin Theroux, were among her many celebrity friends to send their well wishes.
description: Jennifer Aniston shared a rare throwback photo from when she was a small child on Thursday. The 50-year-old Friends vet looked to be about three-years-old.
